content.question: The concern in the petition about the effect of taxation is best understood in continuity with which of the following earlier developments?

choices.label: The increased competition between the British and French in North America
The passage of gradual emancipation laws in some northern states
The revolt against British imperial control of the North American colonies
The development of opposition to the United States Constitution

content.answer: The revolt against British imperial control of the North American colonies

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
